links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien
The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
On [[19 December]] [[1937]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Charles Furth'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, p. 209</ref>

*'''Subject:''' Tolkien replies to a letter from Furth from [[17 December]], regarding the reprint of ''[[The Hobbit]]''.
*'''Publication:''' The largest part of the letter appeared as [[Letter 20]] in ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''. An additional paragraph and a reproduction of the second page was included in  ''[[The Hobbit 50th Anniversary]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=65980|articlename=The Hobbit 50th Anniversary. 1987|dated=|website=TB|accessed=8 July 2012}}</ref>
